description.narrative: The development objectives of EDP II are to: (i) improve teaching quality and the learning environment in general education and in preschool; and (ii) increase governance and managerial capacity of the Ministry of Education and Higher Education (MEHE) and schools.

title.narrative: Increase in % of the 300 project schools implementing the self-evaluation
Number of KG schools furnished and equipped
Increase in % of 3-5 year-olds enrolled in kindergartens in the 230 Component 1 project schools
Increase in cumulative number of regulations or modifications to regulations proposed and approved in order to enable efficient implementation of the ESDP-related reforms
Increase in percentage of 300 project schools with School Improvement Plans approved and under implementation
Ability of the MEHE ICT system to host data for all schools and Regional Education Offices
Number of teachers trained on the Teacher Training, Pedagogical Counselors Training and Psycho-social Counselors Training
Number of KG teachers in classrooms with project supported learning materials who are trained on pedagogic use of new materials
Institutional Development Plan for MEHE capacity building developed and approved
Network infrastructure meets standard penetration and internet security tests
Improved KG learning environment in beneficiary schools (as measured by an improvement in ECERS scores of 50 sample schools)
